# Branch Instructions Test

# --- BEQ: branch taken (x23 == x24) ---
# ADDI x23, x0, 5
00000000010100000000101110010011
# ADDI x24, x0, 5
00000000010100000000110000010011
# BEQ x23, x24, 12  (taken: x23==x24)
00000001100010111000001101100011
# ADDI x25, x0, 10  (should not execute)
00000000101000000000110010010011
# ADDI x25, x0, 20  (should not execute)
00000001010000000000110010010011
# ADDI x25, x0, 30  (executes after branch)
00000001111000000000110010010011

# --- BNE: branch taken (x23 != x24) ---
# ADDI x23, x0, 5
00000000010100000000101110010011
# ADDI x24, x0, 10
00000000101000000000110000010011
# BNE x23, x24, 12  (taken: x23!=x24)
00000001100010111001001101100011
# ADDI x26, x0, 10  (should not execute)
00000000101000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 20  (should not execute)
00000001010000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 40  (executes after branch)
00000010100000000000110100010011

# --- BLT: branch taken (x1=5 < x2=10) ---
# BLT x1, x2, 12  (taken: 5 < 10 signed)
00000000001000001100011001100011
# ADDI x26, x0, 10  (should not execute)
00000000101000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 20  (should not execute)
00000001010000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 30  (executes after branch)
00000001111000000000110100010011

# --- BGE: branch taken (x2=10 >= x1=5) ---
# BGE x2, x1, 12  (taken: 10 >= 5 signed)
00000000000100010101011001100011
# ADDI x26, x0, 10  (should not execute)
00000000101000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 20  (should not execute)
00000001010000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 30  (executes after branch)
00000001111000000000110100010011

# --- BLTU: branch taken (x1=5 <u x2=10) ---
# BLTU x1, x2, 12  (taken: 5 <u 10)
00000000001000001110011001100011
# ADDI x26, x0, 10  (should not execute)
00000000101000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 20  (should not execute)
00000001010000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 30  (executes after branch)
00000001111000000000110100010011

# --- BGEU: branch taken (x2=10 >=u x1=5) ---
# BGEU x2, x1, 12  (taken: 10 >=u 5)
00000000000100010111011001100011
# ADDI x26, x0, 10  (should not execute)
00000000101000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 20  (should not execute)
00000001010000000000110100010011
# ADDI x26, x0, 30  (executes after branch)
00000001111000000000110100010011
